ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t really understand how some people spend so much money on weapons that aren t the best.
ygData.messageBody:
I can't really understand how some people spend so much money on weapons
that aren't the best.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3 [SMTP:nygaardr@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 09, 2001 1:37 PM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
>
> Lvl 55 on my enchanter is the best now for killing greens. I have Area
> effect Tashani for 45mana and my pet can quad hit for 54. I have spent
> the
> last 2 days killing junk in the warrens trying to get non Kos in Paniel.
> Not working to well still scowls ready to attack.
>
> On a side note the Kobolds near the king, maybe other places too I'm not
> sure, drop some of THE BEST looking weapons in the game. Stats not too
> good
> about like FS but the looks are great. Make wonderful pet weapons, even
> though pets duel wield without weapons (except enchanter pets). The
> Katana
> is my favorite followed by a 2hs that looks like the spear graphic but
> looks
> really nice when equipped.
>
> Mu
>
